oai_dc:dc.dc:title: View of Howerton Street and North 7th Street from the Top of Meigs School, 1959
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the area around Howerton Street and North 7th Street from the roof of Meigs School. Possibly Parkway Terrace Apartments visible in the background. Photographed by Jerry Hiland of the Nashville Housing Authority, 15 September 1959. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.); Meigs High School (Nashville, Tenn.);
